item.title: Floyd
item.description:
Floyd said it’s like two lost souls swimming in a fish bowl.
Year after year that was my soul.

Until that bowl transformed into an hour glass,
You can’t count on moments that passed.
In the past?

We all need a tree like the giving one.
At the end we stop where we begun.

Just thanks to breath and the vibrations around.
Open your eyes and taste the sound.

We live together and die alone.
Magic measuring tape and traffic cones.

item.title: The saga of the trees
item.description:
Where one stands
One also falls
Chopped down
The roots remain.
Does it stay the same when it grows back?
What is the it?
What is it?
Does the wind hit it different now?
What is it?
What about the colors and what does the shade smell like?
Sticks and stones at my base.
Come take a seat.
